Reference version 0.6.6

Package

jfsp

jfsp: R functions and data associated with ALFRESCO wildfire model outputs for the Joint Fire Science Program (JFSP).

Plotting

jfsp_plot

Create plots based on various JFSP data sets

Data sets

cost

Historical and projected estimated fire management costs.

costSummary

Projected estimated fire management costs.

basecost

Empirical fire management costs.

fmoba

Annual burn area.

fmobaSummary

Burn area summary statistics.

cdratio

Coniferous:deciduous ratios.

cdba

Coniferous:deciduous burn area.

fbxfire

Probability of fire near Fairbanks, Alaska.

firesize

Alaska fire sizes.

Data set reports

datadoc

Generate a report on a data set

Contents

  • Package
  • Plotting
